column4: I have an iso and I want to burn it to a DVD. What is the recommended "Disc Burner" or whatever?
you can actually just right-click on it, 'burn image to disc'
I'm not sure what the hell is going on, but that option tells me I have "1.4 GB of free space" on an empty DVD-RW disc that is much larger than that.
Do you know why it says that?
